programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: Thomas has the ideal life with a good job, a house, and a loving family. All this is threatened when his mistress is found dead in his swimming pool on the same day his family throws a surprise birthday party in the same backyard. As he scrambles to maintain his life as it has been, Thomas soon discovers that he might not be the only one hiding something.

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: James Bond tries his hand at outwitting a terrorist banker.

programme.title: Faster (2010)
programme.desc: Driver seeks revenge on the man responsible for his brothers death, but a devoted cop gets wind of his plan and tries to stop him from carrying it out. Meanwhile, a hit man attempts to end Drivers life before he completes his task.

programme.title: The Infiltrator (2016)
programme.desc: Federal agent Robert Mazur goes undercover as a money-laundering businessman in an attempt to bring down Pablo Escobars Medellín Cartel in the 1980s. Based on a true story.

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny (1992)
programme.desc: When his young cousin is inadvertently charged with murder in an Alabama town, an untested Brooklyn lawyer takes on his first case as he attempts to defend two penniless youths in the heart of Dixie, where he clearly does not understand the protocols of the courtroom...or the South.

programme.title: Seabiscuit (2003)
programme.desc: A triumphant Cinderella story about the crowd-pleasing Depression-era thoroughbred Seabiscuit. Together, Seabiscuits downtrodden jockey, wizened trainer and entrepreneurial owner lead the horse to several victories that helped to inspire a Americans during the downtrodden 1930s.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles (1987)
programme.desc: Tale about a snob and a slob on the road who keep running into trouble?and each other?on their respective way home for Thanksgiving after they get stuck in Wichita when they were en route to Chicago.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy (1999)
programme.desc: A woman is framed for the murder of her husband in this riveting thriller. While in prison, she discovers her husbands alive. Knowing that she cant be tried for the same crime twice, she vows to find him upon her release from jail.

programme.title: Sasquatch Sunset (2024)
programme.desc: Deep in the remote wilderness, an unusual and wholly unique family passes their days in relative harmony. The tribe of Sasquatches, though reclusive, creates a thriving community steeped in its own ways as the members navigate love, loss, and hopes for the future.

programme.title: Bad Behaviour (2023)
programme.desc: When a former child actor tries to reconnect with her daughter, she is led to a spiritual enlightenment retreat. Their relationship is very complicated, and they put all of their trust in a guru and experimental ideas to try and bring them back together.

programme.title: Divergent (2014)
programme.desc: In a society where the population is segregated by personality, a teenager classified as "divergent" uncovers a plot to kill everyone in her category and races to find out why they are considered so uniquely dangerous.

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent (2015)
programme.desc: Tris and Four seek refuge outside of the city with the Amity faction. They convene with other Divergents and exiled survivors, and plot to fight back against the warmongering Dauntless and despot Jeanine Matthews.

programme.title: Looper (2012)
programme.desc: Time travel and the mob send a hired gun running for his life when he must kill an older version of himself in order to prevent an underworld bloodbath.

programme.title: Runaway Jury (2003)
programme.desc: In this suspenseful, well-plotted and beautifully acted legal thriller, an attorney whos brought a wrongful-death lawsuit against a gun manufacturer, a jury consultant working for the company, and a member of the jury cross paths. The film is based on a John Grisham bestseller.

programme.title: Michael Clayton (2007)
programme.desc: A burned-out "fixer" at a powerful corporate law firm in New York City who faces a crisis of conscience.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street (2013)
programme.desc: A young financial whiz has a meteoric rise in the business world, but falls victim to a life of hedonistic excess and greed.

programme.title: Looper (2012)

programme.desc: The genetically engineered dinosaurs return in Steven Spielberg's sequel to "Jurassic Park." This time, they're wreaking havoc on an island near the site of the disastrous theme park. Although Dr. Malcolm (Jeff Goldblum) reluctantly travels there to remove the deadly creatures, the real trouble starts when one makes its way to San Diego. Julianne Moore, Pete Postlethwaite, Arliss Howard. . (Repeat).

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Sam Neill is back as paleontologist Alan Grant for another wild walk in the park. William H. Macy and Tea Leoni costar as a couple whose son is lost on a remote dino-infested island. Posing as wealthy adventurers, they lure Grant to the island to help in their search, and all three get much more than they bargained for. The special effects are outstanding. Alessandro Nivola, Trevor Morgan, Michael Jeter. (Repeat).

programme.desc: In this thrilling fourth installment of the "Jurassic Park" franchise, two young brothers visit an aunt who's an executive at Jurassic World, a theme park populated with genetically resurrected dinosaurs. But chaos erupts when a newly created dino escapes its enclosure, forcing the park's animal behaviorist to save the day. (Repeat).

programme.desc: A Korean American family relocates to a small farm in Arkansas in the 1980s – to pursue their own version of the American Dream. The arrival of their irreverent grandmother disrupts the balance they try to maintain between cultural assimilation and autonomy. (Repeat).

Mother and daughter find themselves dealing with this unique encounter as a team despite their different perspecties. What follows is an eye-opening journey where the duo explore the depths of loss and love in unexpected ways. (Repeat).

She plays Bridget, a London "singleton" desperate to lose weight, cut down on her vices and find Mr. Right. The film chronicles her romantic entanglements with two gents: her playboy boss (Hugh Grant) and a snooty lawyer (Colin Firth). Jim Broadbent, Gemma Jones. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Watchers
programme.desc: In rural western Ireland, Mina, a twentysomething artist, finds herself lost amidst an expansive wilderness. Upon finding shelter for the night with three strangers, the unlikely foursome soon finds themselves the target of a sinister, enigmatic creature haunting the night. (Repeat).

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: In this raunchy yet heartfelt comedy, a commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care. Unrated version. (Repeat).

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia
programme.desc: David Lean's epic Best Picture about British Army lieutenant T.E. Lawrence, who galvanized the Arab revolt against the Turks in World War I, endured indignities from his Turkish captors and eventually led his forces to a number of smashing victories. The film won a total of seven Academy Awards, including director, cinematography, editing and score. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: Christopher Nolan digs deeper into the dark psychological underpinnings of "Batman Begins" (2005) in this intense sequel. Batman and idealistic DA Harvey Dent join forces to arrest and prosecute Gotham City's crime lords, but their initial success turns to ashes when the deranged Joker raises the stakes by declaring all-out war on the forces of law and order. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Created in a San Francisco lab by an ambitious father-and-son scientist team seeking to cure Alzheimer's disease, genetically engineered chimp Caesar (Andy Serkis) uses his powerful intellect to lead an ape uprising in this thrilling sci-fi prequel. (Repeat).

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: The romantic adventures of fashionable New York City writer Carrie Bradshaw (Sarah Jessica Parker) and her three chic friends continue in what could be the ultimate chick flick, a glitzy, gal-pleasing movie adaptation of the popular HBO series. Expect love, marriage plans and maybe even a baby carriage. Kim Cattrall, Cynthia Nixon, Kristen Davis, Chris Noth. (Repeat).

programme.desc: In this affecting drama, Robert Pattinson stars as a veterinary student who falls for a married circus performer (Reese Witherspoon) when their shared affections for an extraordinary elephant stir profound feelings of compassion within both of them. programme.title: James Acaster: Hecklers Welcome
programme.desc: James Acaster explores his love/hate relationship with standup by relinquishing control of his set and accepting a healthy dose of audience interference – aka heckling. With his wiry observational eye and incomparable wit, Acaster shares hilarious on-the-fly meta-analysis of his own material, along with stories from his childhood that spurred him to pursue a career in comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: It's Florida, Man
programme.desc: A quirky detective navigates wild and bizarre cases in Florida, uncovering strange mysteries in his sunny, chaotic state. Expect humor and unexpected twists. (Repeat).

programme.title: It's Florida, Man
programme.desc: A quirky adventure unfolds as strange events and wild antics take over in Florida. Expect unexpected mishaps and lots of humor in this entertaining journey. (Repeat).

programme.desc: A man encounters wild adventures and quirky characters in Florida, leading to comedic and unpredictable situations filled with local charm and eccentricity. (Repeat).

programme.title: It's Florida, Man
programme.desc: On Jenada Isle, an out-of-control rabbit population pits rescuers against residents determined to keep their free-roaming fuzzy friends. (Repeat).

programme.title: It's Florida, Man
programme.desc: This irreverent HBO comedy series brings to life unbelievable, ripped-from-the-headlines, tales of Florida, with interviews from locals and playful reenactments starring a cast of Hollywood actors and comedians that includes Anna Faris, Jake Johnson, Randall Park, Juliette Lewis, Sam Richardson, Ego Nwodim, and more. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pretty Woman
programme.desc: A Hollywood hooker signs on for a weeklong job with a john who is a corporate raider; he pays for a makeover so she can act as his "date." (Repeat).

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A misfit Viking teen befriends a dragon, despite his tribe's tradition of dragon slaying, in this thrilling adaptation of the children's fantasy book by Cressida Cowell. (Repeat).

programme.title: Smoking Tigers
programme.desc: This coming-of-age drama follows the story of Hayoung as she navigates her new life during the 2000s in Los Angeles. Of Korean-American descent, she is still affected by the separation of her parents while trying to be a strong big sister to her younger sister. As the sixteen-year-old starts school in a new elite institution, she encounters new challenges in balancing her exposure to wealthy friends at school and enacting her low-income home realities. (Repeat).

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: In this all-star, screwball comedy, an estranged Hollywood couple (Catherine Zeta-Jones, John Cusack) tries to create the illusion that they're happy at a press junket for their upcoming movie. Julia Roberts also stars as the actress's sister, who secretly loves brother-in-law Cusack. Billy Crystal, Christopher Walken, Hank Azaria, Stanley Tucci. (Repeat).

programme.title: Somebody Somewhere
programme.desc: Sam navigates life in her hometown, facing big changes around her. These shifts might inspire her to focus on personal growth and find her own path. (Repeat).

programme.title: Signs
programme.desc: M. Night Shyamalan (director de "El Sexto Sentido") escribió esta historia protagonizada por Mel Gibson como un ex-pastor desilusionado, que descubre misteriosos círculos en sus tierras. Al poco tiempo, descubre que esto está pasando en todo el mundo, lo que podría señalar el fin de la humanidad.

programme.title: 21 and Over
programme.desc: Jeff Chang es un talentoso estudiante de medicina que siempre ha hecho lo correcto; pero de repente, se da cuenta de lo que ha sido su vida y pone en peligro su educación cuando decide celebrar su cumpleaños número 21 con dos amigos una noche antes de un examen muy importante para la facultad de medicina. Lo que se suponía que iba a ser solo una cerveza rápida se convierte en una noche de humillación que termina en desastre.

programme.title: Get Millie Black
programme.desc: Una detective regresa a Jamaica para resolver un caso complicado. Enfrenta desafíos personales y descubre secretos oscuros mientras busca la verdad oculta.

programme.title: Winter's Tale
programme.desc: Peter Lake se gana la vida en el duro Nueva York del siglo XIX, a veces de manera no muy honrada. Un día, planea un atraco a una rica mansión supuestamente vacía... Pero cuando Peter entra en ella, descubre que una hermosa joven vive allí. Una hermosa joven, Beverly Penn, gravemente enferma, de la que pronto se enamora y por la que construirá un mundo de fantasía.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Michelle Darnell es una inescrupulosa mujer de negocios que pierde todo luego de ser enviada a prisión por tráfico de influencias. Al quedar libre, se dispone a convertirse en la empresaria favorita del país, pero no todos están dispuestos a perdonarla. Ella se verá obligada a trabajar con una empleada, a la que solía maltratar bastante seguido, y con su hija, una Girl Scout que le aporta la brillante idea de dedicarse el imperio del brownie, un negocio multimillonario.

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: Un cuento sobre el crecimiento y el paso de la adolescencia a la madurez, situado en el 2002 en Sacramento, una adolescente excéntrica que asiste a una escuela secundaria católica lidia con el dolor del primer amor y los enfrentamientos con su madre sobre sus planes para el futuro.

programme.title: The Making of the Penguin
programme.desc: Un pingüino lucha por sobrevivir en la Antártida. Explora su vida diaria mientras enfrenta desafíos extremos y descubre la belleza de su entorno helado.

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Las joyas de la comedia Tina Fey y Amy Poehler se unen en esta demoledora y traviesa aventura. Fay interpreta a una mujer exitosa que no puede tener hijos y arregla que una joven insensata de clase trabajadora sea la madre biológica de su hijo. Steve Martin, Sigourney Weaver. Escrita y dirigida por Michael McCullers.

programme.title: Caro Comes Out
programme.desc: Caro Hernández, una escritora cubanoamericana, quiere anunciarle a su familia, cuyos miembros residen en Miami, que es lesbiana.

programme.desc: Una niña de apenas seis años y sus amigos pasan un verano maravilloso, disfrutando de los días estivales viviendo muchas aventuras alrededor de un pequeño motel. Su inocencia, por el bien de ellos, les impide darse cuenta que sus padres y el resto de adultos que los rodean atraviesan momentos muy difíciles.

programme.desc: En un mundo donde la privacidad es un lujo, una persona descubre que está siendo observada constantemente. Este inquietante descubrimiento cambia su vida para siempre.

programme.desc: El periodista desacreditado Mikael Blomkvist y la misteriosa pirata informática Lisbeth Salander trabajan juntos para resolver el misterio de un asesinato ocurrido 40 años atrás y así destapar los secretos oscuros de una familia rica.

programme.title: Muerte, muerte, muerte
programme.desc: Un grupo de veinteañeros planea una fiesta del huracán, pero un juego se vuelve mortal.

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Suspenso inteligente e intenso sobre un psicólogo infantil (Bruce Willis) que ayuda a un niño atormentado (Haley Joel Osment) que asegura poder ver a los muertos.

programme.title: La franquicia
programme.sub-title: Escena 31A: Tecto se encuentra con los ojos
programme.desc: Mientras los problemas plagan el set de la última película de superhéroes de Maximum Studios, Tecto: Eye of the Storm, el primer asistente de dirección Dan se esfuerza por mantener al equipo a flote en medio de una serie de cambios.

programme.title: The Franchise
programme.desc: Dan intenta completar una escena difícil bajo presión. Anita toma el control como productora. Eric pide más extras. La tensión en el set aumenta rápidamente.

programme.title: The Franchise
programme.desc: Un estudio enfrenta críticas por su representación de mujeres. Anita se esfuerza por mejorar un personaje femenino mientras Adam lidia con efectos de sus suplementos.

programme.title: The Franchise
programme.desc: Un equipo de cine enfrenta desafíos mientras intenta incluir un famoso superhéroe en su película. Las tensiones aumentan con la competencia de otra de la franquicia.

programme.title: The Franchise
programme.desc: Un equipo de producción enfrenta desafíos en el set de una película. Inseguridades, decisiones complicadas y un equipo insatisfecho ponen a prueba su determinación.

programme.title: The Franchise
programme.desc: Cuando el equipo amenaza con amotinarse debido a otro rodaje nocturno, Dan intenta elevar la moral, mientras Eric se anticipa a la visita de un director de primera. Mientras tanto, Peter y Steph coquetean con posibles infracciones de RRHH.

programme.title: The Franchise
programme.desc: Cuando el equipo amenaza con amotinarse debido a otro rodaje nocturno, Dan intenta elevar la moral, mientras Eric se anticipa a la visita de un director de primera. Mientras tanto, Peter y Steph coquetean con posibles infracciones de RRHH.
