programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Un magnate inaugura un parque temático habitado por dinosaurios creados gracias a la ciencia. Tras haber clonado diferentes especies y manipularlas genéticamente, su empresa de bioingeniería logró recuperar a estas criaturas extinguidas. En la apertura este magnífico lugar ubicado en una isla de Costa Rica, desborda de gente y todos están felices y asombrados. Hasta que la naturaleza les tiene preparada una sorpresa.

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Han pasado cuatro años del fracaso del Parque Jurásico del multimillonario John Hammond, quien llama al Doctor Ian Malcolm para convocarlo a su nuevo proyecto en una desierta isla de Costa Rica, donde viven en libertad cientos de dinosaurios. Que son descendientes de los animales clonados en el laboratorio y que se están reproduciendo rápidamente. Lo que el profesional desconoce es que hay otra expedición que está en marcha con objetivos que no son para nada científicos.

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Sam Neill vuelve a hacer su rol como el paleontólogo Alan Grant en esta secuela llena de efectos especiales fantásticos. William H. Macy y Tea Leoni coprotagonizan como una pareja cuyo hijo está perdido en una isla remota, llena de dinosaurios. Éstos se hacen pasar por aventureros adinerados, y engañan a Grant, con el fin de que le ayude a localizar a su hijo, pero ¡no saben lo que les espera!

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Un conjunto hotelero basado en el Parque Jurásico atrae a miles de visitantes cada año, así como lo imaginó John Hammond. Sin embargo, tras una mala participación que se lleva a cabo al revitalizar el Parque Jurásico, una vez más los intentos de la humanidad de interferir con la naturaleza traerán resultados siniestros.

programme.title: Dune, Prophecy
programme.desc: Un joven noble descubre un oscuro secreto familiar en un planeta desértico. Debe enfrentar peligros y cumplir con su destino para salvar a su pueblo.

programme.title: The Last Black Man in San Francisco
programme.desc: A black man who lives with his best friend and works in an elderly care facility dreams of living in the grand Victorian house his grandfather built in the Fillmore District. Now a white, affluent area, he is totally priced out of the neighborhood, but it doesn't stop him from dreaming in this drama about place, identity and race. (Repeat).

programme.title: Civil War
programme.desc: In the not-so-distant future, the United States finds itself plunged into a dystopian nightmare as violent conflict erupts across the nation. A team of scrappy journalists entrenched in the military bands together to venture to the nation's capital before a troupe of rebels destroys the last bastion of normalcy in the country. (Repeat).

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Electrifying chronicle of the seminal rap group N.W.A. and their 'hood-to-riches success, tracing their story from the mean streets of mid-'80s Compton to their triumphant battles against censorship. (Repeat).

programme.title: Captain Fantastic
programme.desc: In this charming comedy-drama, a father raises his six children in a forest in the Pacific Northwest. But when a family tragedy prompts them to take a road trip to New Mexico, the kids are forced to interact with the outside world for the first time. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins stars in this fast-paced saga as a billionaire whose flight to Alaska crashes in the wilderness. With another survivor (Alec Baldwin), and armed with only a pocket knife, he struggles with his own insecurities while trying to stay alive. Elle Macpherson, Harold Perrineau, L.Q. Jones, Kathleen Wilhoite, David Lindstedt, Mark Kiely, Gordon Tootoosis. (Repeat).

programme.title: To Sir, With Love
programme.desc: An inexperienced and idealistic teacher invests himself in a group of problem kids at a high school in a slum of London's East End. (Repeat).

programme.title: After the Bite
programme.desc: Following a series of great white shark attacks that dominated the headlines, one Cape Cod community renegotiates its relationship with the marine environment. Local residents, fishermen, and environmentalists are forced to confront dramatic changes to their way of life. How far can we push nature before it bites back? (Repeat).

programme.title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown
programme.desc: When a famous cowboy is murdered in cold blood, his crotchety sidekick Lefty is determined to lead his own posse and bring the killer to justice. Along the way, Lefty must learn what it takes to be a hero in this clever Western. (Repeat).

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: In this thrilling and provocative revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff. (Repeat).

programme.title: Southside With You
programme.desc: Touching docudrama about Barack Obama's first date with Michelle Robinson, his future wife, during the summer of 1989 in Chicago. (Repeat).

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: James L. Brooks' acclaimed romantic comedy about a plucky New York waitress (Helen Hunt) and a phobic, curmudgeonly novelist (Jack Nicholson). Greg Kinnear costars as his gay neighbor in this story of love, forgiveness and acceptance. The three leads were Oscar-nominated. Cuba Gooding Jr., Skeet Ulrich, Shirley Knight. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Farewell
programme.desc: After her beloved grandmother is diagnosed with terminal cancer, a Chinese-American woman returns to China for a family gathering secretly designed to say goodbye to the matriarch. However, when it becomes apparent that grandma is the only one unaware of the diagnosis, she struggles to keep the secret. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: This exhilarating spin-off of "Snow White and the Huntsman" acts as both prequel and sequel to the original film, detailing the adventures of Eric the Huntsman as he gets caught up in the rivalry between wicked queens Ravenna and Freya. During his quest, Eric is also endangered by his feelings for fellow warrior Sara, since ice queen Freya has decreed that love is forbidden in her kingdom. (Repeat).

programme.title: Prisoners
programme.desc: In this provocative, heart-stopping thriller, a small-town man butts heads with a cop after his daughter and her best friend are kidnapped. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: In this suspense-filled horror film, two siblings uncover a harrowing secret about their grandparents while spending a week at their remote Pennsylvania farm. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
programme.desc: A teenage boy ingratiates himself with the family of a cardiovascular surgeon. Gradually, he begins to reveal his dark intentions, causing the surgeon's life to spin out of control in this unnerving psychological thriller. (Repeat).

programme.title: A Bigger Splash
programme.desc: A rock star and her boyfriend find their vacation interrupted by an old flame of hers, a music producer who clearly wants to win her back. Meanwhile, the latter's daughter also appears eager to break up the couple in this dazzling, erotic drama. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Glass Castle
programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a memoir by Jeannette Walls, a young woman reflects on her unconventional upbringing at the hands of her artsy, nonconformist parents. Now married to a man who works in finance in New York, she faces criticism from her parents that she's betrayed their values. (Repeat).

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: Director M. Night Shyamalan followed the chilling "The Sixth Sense" with this riveting thriller. Bruce Willis is security guard David Dunn, who survives a devastating train wreck miraculously unharmed. The owner (Samuel L. Jackson) of a comic-book art gallery sees him as a mysterious protector with a higher calling, but Dunn is doubtful. Robin Wright Penn, Spencer Treat Clark, Eamonn Walker. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Kill Team
programme.desc: HD. After a sadistic new staff sergeant takes over his platoon, a young U.S. Army soldier finds himself caught in a deadly moral quandary. Ends 02/11 (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.sub-title: When You're Lost in the Darkness
programme.desc: A hardened survivor is hired for an impossible task. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: In 2003, an Indonesian scientist makes a devastating discovery. In 2023, now outside of the quarantine zone, Joel and Tess clash over Ellie's fate as they navigate a long-abandoned Boston overrun with Infected. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After a global pandemic, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Of Us
programme.desc: After a pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: On the streets of a newly free Kansas City, Henry fights to protect his brother Sam from rebel soldiers who will stop at nothing to appease their ruthless leader. As her manhunt continues, Kathleen doubles down on her quest for revenge, while Ellie forms a meaningful friendship. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After months of traveling, Joel and Ellie receive a grave warning about what lies ahead. Later, Ellie learns more about Joel's past – while Joel tries his best to forget. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: As Joel fights to survive, Ellie's struggle to save him stirs memories of her life in a FEDRA orphanage. Weeks before meeting Joel, Ellie recalls joining her best friend Riley for a night to remember... one that will change the course of both of their lives – and the fate of the world – forever. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Of Us
programme.desc: Ellie crosses paths with a vengeful group of survivors, and draws the attention of its leader. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After being pursued by Infected, a pregnant Anna places her trust in a lifelong friend. Years later, Ellie is forced to grapple with the emotional toll of her journey, while Joel faces a devastating decision of his own. (Repeat).

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding thriller, a veteran engineer and a young conductor must stop a runaway train loaded with volatile cargo from derailing and causing an explosion big enough to destroy a town. (Repeat).

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In a small town in 1989 Maine, seven bullied kids discover that a malevolent force is preying on the local children. Soon, they band together to destroy the monster, a killer clown called Pennywise, in this nerve-shredding horror film. (Repeat).

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: This horror-mystery film follows awkward teen Owen who, in the 1990s, becomes a big fan of a monster-driven horror television show called The Pink Opaque. In school, he encounters another awkward teen, Maddy, who also likes the show. The two form a bond by watching the show. But when the show is canceled, their interaction also dwindles. Reconnecting again in their twenties, they revisit their fandom of the show as their reality also starts shifting mysteriously. (Repeat).

programme.title: Addicted
programme.desc: A career-driven wife and mother begins an adulterous affair that could be the death of her in this nail-biting thriller adapted from the popular novel. By the time her husband finds out, it may already be too late to save her. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Florida Project
programme.desc: A single mother lives with her 6-year-old daughter in a cheap Florida motel run by a tough but kind manager. The girl spends her time daydreaming and playing with other kids, while her mom struggles to make ends meet in this touching, powerful drama. (Repeat).

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: In this wild and anarchic "super-antihero" film, a team of incarcerated villains, including Deadshot, Harley Quinn, Enchantress, El Diablo and Killer Croc, are recruited by the government for a dangerous mission in exchange for reduced sentences. (Repeat).

actor.role: Dr Harleen F. Quinzel / Harley Quinn

programme.title: Beowulf
programme.desc: Ripping and rousing epic about the mythic Scandinavian hero (Ray Winstone) and his band of warriors who set out to save a kingdom by vanquishing fire-breathing dragons and a bewitching creature of the deep (played with watery menace by Angelina Jolie). Crispin Glover is a freaky fright as the demonic, misshapen Grendel. Directed by Robert Zemeckis. Written by Neil Gaiman and Roger Avary. (Repeat).

programme.title: House of the Dragon
programme.desc: Learn the Targaryens' story. (Repeat).

programme.title: House of the Dragon
programme.desc: Princess Rhaenyra looks deeper into the prophecies surrounding the House of Targaryen. (Repeat).

programme.title: House Of The Dragon
programme.desc: Daemon and the Sea Snake take on the Crabfeeder; the realm celebrates Aegon's second nameday and Rhaenyra struggles with the prospect of marriage. (Repeat).

programme.title: House Of The Dragon
programme.desc: After the successful completion of the battle, Daemon returns to court. (Repeat).

programme.title: House of the Dragon
programme.desc: Viserys and Rhaenyra broker agreements with the Velaryons. (Repeat).

programme.title: House of the Dragon
programme.desc: Ten years later. Rhaenyra navigates Alicent's continued speculation about her children, while Daemon and Laena weigh an offer in Pentos. (Repeat).

programme.title: House Of The Dragon
programme.desc: As the families gather on Driftmark for a funeral, Viserys calls for an end to infighting and Alicent demands justice. (Repeat).

programme.title: House Of The Dragon
programme.desc: Six years later. With the Driftmark succession suddenly critical, Rhaenyra attempts to strike a bargain with Rhaenys. (Repeat).

programme.title: House Of The Dragon
programme.desc: While Alicent enlists Cole and Aemond to track down Aegon, Otto gathers the great houses of Westeros to affirm their alllegiance. (Repeat).

programme.title: House of the Dragon
programme.desc: While mourning a tragic loss, Rhaenyra tries to hold the realm together, and Daemon prepares for war. (Repeat).

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: The immense King Kong finds an unlikely ally in the fierce Godzilla as a new, gargantuan threat emerges from deep within the Hollow Earth to threaten all living species, including both Kong and Godzilla. The ape and the lizard must battle the new titan while their human counterparts unlock a series of new secrets hidden on Skull Island. (Repeat).

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: In this thrilling fourth installment of the "Jurassic Park" franchise, two young brothers visit an aunt who's an executive at Jurassic World, a theme park populated with genetically resurrected dinosaurs. But chaos erupts when a newly created dino escapes its enclosure, forcing the park's animal behaviorist to save the day. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding installment in the dystopian young-adult series, Thomas and the other Gladers journey across an obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the organization known as WCKD. (Repeat).

programme.title: Good Hair
programme.desc: Comedian Chris Rock channels his razor-sharp wit in a new direction in this illuminating documentary about the role of hair in the African-American community and its far-reaching effect on cultural identity. Also: a look at the highly competitive world of black stylists. (Repeat).

programme.title: Forever My Girl
programme.desc: A country-music star returns to his hometown, where he reconnects with an old flame—and is shocked to learn that they have a daughter together. In time, he reflects on the life he left behind and the man he wants to be in this stirring romance. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Tough Love
programme.desc: Madea has a run-in with the law and finds herself sentenced to community service. After discovering that the local youth center is in danger of being shut down, she enlists the help of her family and the neighborhood kids to save it. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: The first film in the series introduced maladroit French police inspector Jacques Clouseau, who attempts to foil high-society thieves who have targeted a prize jewel called the Pink Panther. Henry Mancini's score was Oscar nominated. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Pink Panther Strikes Again
programme.desc: The bumbling Inspector Clouseau drives his former superior so crazy that the ex-boss becomes a deranged criminal who threatens to use a death ray on random people unless his former underling is offered as a sacrifice. (Repeat).

programme.title: Being Mary Tyler Moore
programme.desc: With unprecedented access to the Mary Tyler Moore Estate, friends, family, and colleagues, Being Mary Tyler Moore constructs an intimate mosaic of Mary's sixty-year career in show business. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Words That Built America
programme.desc: Documentary bringing together celebrities, politicians and other prominent figures to recite the Declaration of Independence, the United States Constitution and the Bill of Rights. In celebration of American Independence Day, this documentary brings together celebrities, politicians and other prominent figures to recite the Declaration of Independence, the United States Constitution and the Bill of Rights. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon and Theodore enter a battle-of-the-bands competition and face off against a group of female singing chipmunks known as the Chippettes in this wacky and hilarious sequel to the family-friendly hit. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gremlins 2: The New Batch
programme.desc: The creatures commandeer a skyscraper in a satiric sequel. Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, John Glover. Grandpa Fred: Robert Prosky. Forster: Robert Picardo. Dr. Catheter: Christopher Lee. Marla: Haviland Morris. Murray: Dick Miller. Sheila: Jackie Joseph. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
programme.desc: An all-star cast and family-friendly spyjinks power the third chapter of the delightful "Spy Kids" film series. This time, a villainous computer programmer kidnaps Carmen and traps her inside a video game. Her younger brother Juni springs into action and enters the game to rescue her. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ondine
programme.desc: In this breathtaking drama directed by Neil Jordan, romance blossoms between a fisherman (Colin Farrell) and a mysterious woman (Alicja Bachleda) he rescues from drowning, but a violent figure from her past threatens to destroy their relationship. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pulling Strings
programme.desc: This adorable comedy follows an ambitious mariachi singer who hopes to convince a customs worker to accept his visa, and finds love in the process. (Repeat).

programme.title: Big Miracle
programme.desc: Alaskan newsman Adam Carlson (John Krasinski) and Greenpeace volunteer Rachel Kramer team up to help free a family of gray whales that are trapped in the Arctic Circle in this uplifting drama inspired by actual events. (Repeat).

programme.title: Flipped
programme.desc: Schoolboy Bryce (Callan McAuliffe) realizes that the girl he has struggled to avoid may be his one true love in this heartfelt romantic comedy. Over the course of six years, Juli pines for Bryce, who does everything in his power to put her off. Later, as the pair enter junior high, Bryce discovers girls and realizes his true feelings for Juli. (Repeat).

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: Diana must thwart the schemes of two new enemies, media mogul Maxwell Lord and her former friend Barbara Ann Minerva as the threat of the Cold War looms over American soil. However, she must also grapple with the unexpected return of her lost love, Steve. (Repeat).

Visionary director Shane Acker expands his Oscar-winning animated short into a full-length feature with this adventure about a group of rag dolls battling an army of robots in a postapocalyptic world. (Repeat).

programme.title: Menashe
programme.desc: This moving drama centers on a Hasidic Jewish man living in New York City who fights to retain custody of his son after his wife's death, as tradition dictates that the boy must be raised in a household with a mother. If he doesn't remarry quickly, his son will be adopted by his late spouse's stern brother. (Repeat).

programme.title: How to Eat Fried Worms
programme.desc: Excellent coming-of-age fare about a new kid (Luke Benward) in school who may have bitten off more than he can chew when he bets the school bully (Adam Hicks) that he can swallow 10 creepy crawlies. Written and directed by Bob Dolman, who adapted the 1973 Thomas Rockwell kid-lit best seller, which received an animated TV treatment in 1985. Hallie Kate Eisenberg, Tom Cavanagh, Kimberly Williams-Paisley, James Rebhorn. (Repeat).

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Christopher Reeve as the Man of Steel in a big-budget epic with Oscar-winning effects. Marlon Brando, Margot Kidder, Gene Hackman, Ned Beatty, Valerie Perrine, Jackie Cooper, Susannah York, Glenn Ford. Richard Donner directed. (Repeat).

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Superman gives up his powers to have a normal life, only to be confronted by three criminals from his home planet who have arrived on Earth with the super powers he has forfeited and seek revenge against him. (Repeat).

programme.title: It's Me, Hilary: The Man Who Drew Eloise
programme.desc: A profile of illustrator Hilary Knight, who collaborated on the "Eloise" children's books with author Kay Thompson, features home movies and interviews with fans of his animation, including executive producer Lena Dunham, Mindy Kaling and Fran Lebowitz. (Repeat).

programme.title: Don't Divorce Me! Kids' Rules for Parents on Divorce
programme.desc: Children talk about divorce and offer advice for parents to make sure kids are not manipulated, forgotten or mistreated when the time for permanent separation comes. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: Peter Jackson directed the magnificent adaptation of the first book in J.R.R. Tolkien's trilogy. Elijah Wood stars as Frodo Baggins, a hobbit who inherits a magical ring and spurs a titanic struggle between good and evil in Middle-earth. Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen, Sean Astin, Liv Tyler, Christopher Lee, Ian Holm. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: Writer-director Tyler Perry's fourth film is an uproarious, insightful comedy about a hard-luck single mom (Angela Bassett) from Chicago who attends her long-estranged father's funeral in rural Georgia and meets a clan of offbeat relatives she didn't know she had. Former NBA star Rick Fox costars as a college hoops coach who is romantically interested in Bassett. Perry costars as Joe and has a cameo as his recurring character, the larger-than-life matriarch, Madea. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: Bumbling squirrel Scrat accidentally sends an asteroid hurtling toward Earth, which forces Manny the woolly mammoth, Sid the sloth and Diego the saber-toothed tiger to embark on a journey to save the planet in this winning animated sequel. (Repeat).

programme.title: DC League of Super-Pets
programme.desc: This animated tale focuses on Krypto the Super-Dog, otherwise known as Superman's pet. Since he has his own superpowers, Krypto enjoys saving the world with the Man of Steel. However, he finds himself challenged when Superman is kidnapped one day, and the other human superheroes can't help. With the help of superpower-infused animals in a shelter, it's up to Krypto to save the world and save his superhuman. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: Charlie Brown, Snoopy, Woodstock and friends embark on an epic adventure in this charming adaptation of the beloved comic strip. (Repeat).

programme.title: Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore
programme.desc: Feline spy Kitty Galore plots to conquer the world and gain the upper paw over her rivals in this hilarious comedy-adventure. In order to fight this unforeseen threat, cats and dogs must band together to face a common enemy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ramona and Beezus
programme.desc: Based on Beverly Cleary's best-selling children's novels, this charming film follows the adventures of a mischievous young girl named Ramona Quimby (Joey King) as she annoys her older sister (Selena Gomez) and attempts to save her family's home. (Repeat).

programme.title: Inkheart
programme.desc: What a fantastic magical delight this is. Brendan Fraser stars as a book collector who, along with his 12-year-old daughter (Eliza Hope Bennett), has the ability to bring fictional book characters to life, among them a nasty fairy-tale villain who wants to use their powers for his own evil doings. Helen Mirren, Paul Bettany, Andy Serkis. Directed by Iain Softley. The film is adapted from the kid-lit favorite by Cornelia Funke. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote, directed, produced and costars in this gripping drama about a scandal that rocks two families with a lengthy history. One of them is upper-class, the other working class, and each is led by a strong-willed matriarch who are long-time friends. Kathy Bates and Alfre Woodard are outstanding as the two women trying to keep their respective families from ruining countless lives. The superb ensemble cast also features Sanaa Lathan, Cole Hauser, Rockmond Dunbar and Kadee Strickland. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dark hilarity ensues after the Addams family—and their macabre traditions—relocate to suburbia, 21st century New Jersey. As they prepare for a major celebration that involves their extended family, they have to maneuver around the machinations of a devious reality-television host. (Repeat).

programme.title: How Do You Measure a Year?
programme.desc: For 17 years, filmmaker Jay Rosenblatt filmed his daughter Ella on her birthday in the same spot, asking her the same questions. In just 29 minutes, we watch her grow from a toddler to a young woman with all the beautiful and sometimes awkward stages in between. Each phase is captured fleetingly but makes an indelible mark. Her responses to her father's questions are just a backdrop for a deeper story of parental love, acceptance, and ultimately, independence. (Repeat).

programme.title: The LEGO Batman Movie
programme.desc: In this brilliant and hilarious spin-off of "The Lego Movie," Batman defends Gotham City from criminals and supervillains while bonding with a young orphan he accidentally adopted—who, of course, eventually becomes his sidekick Robin. (Repeat).

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: This fantasy musical film follows the story of Willy Wonka, the famous but eccentric chocolatier based on the character from Roald Dahl's novel. In particular, it emphasizes his rise to the top. The narrative traces his beginnings as a young adult who started as an employee selling chocolate in a store until he became driven to enter the chocolate industry eventually. This film acts as a prequel to the 1971 film adaptation of Dahl's novel. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Tough Love
programme.desc: Madea has a run-in with the law and finds herself sentenced to community service. After discovering that the local youth center is in danger of being shut down, she enlists the help of her family and the neighborhood kids to save it. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Director Robert Rodriguez ("From Dusk till Dawn") crafted this family film about a married pair of former secret agents (Antonio Banderas, Carla Gugino) whose espionage genes come in handy when their kids have to rescue them from a madman who wants to rule the world. Alan Cumming, Alexa Vega, Daryl Sabara, Tony Shalhoub, Teri Hatcher, Cheech Marin. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams
programme.desc: Writer-director Robert Rodriguez's follow-up to his blockbuster family hit is even bigger and better than the original. The wildly imaginative story involves the search for a mad scientist (Steve Buscemi) on an island crawling with mutated creatures. All of the main cast members are back, including Antonio Banderas and Carla Gugino. Alexa Vega, Daryl Sabara. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shorts
programme.desc: Imagination breeds hilarity when a rainbow-colored rock grants a boy named Toe (Jimmy Bennett) his every wish, causing his corporate-run town to be overrun with miniature spaceships and crocodile armies. Once the grown-ups get their hands on the rock, the real trouble begins. (Repeat).

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: In this family-friendly comedy, a super-size Great Dane named Marmaduke, who's prone to making messes, moves with his loving family to California where he suffers from culture shock and tries to win the heart of a female canine. (Repeat).

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The first big-screen adventure of the popular children's (and adults') cartoon series follows SpongeBob as he sets out to retrieve King Neptune's stolen crown, save Mr. Krabs, who has been accused of the theft, and stymie Plankton and his plot for world domination. (Repeat).

programme.title: Lioness
programme.desc: Events come to a head at the Carrillo estate faster than expected. Josie makes her move. (Repeat).

programme.title: Killing Eve
programme.sub-title: I Have a Thing About Bathrooms
programme.desc: Having survived a terrifying close call with Villanelle, Eve now has the mole ensconced in a safe house and is buzzing. They have an exciting opportunity to glean information and crack this thing open. (Repeat).

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: This thrilling war epic is about an American military officer who leads a special squad of soldiers who perform quick strikes against the Nazis in enemy territory. They team up with a French theater owner whose parents were killed by the Third Reich for a plot to execute Hitler and his right-hand men at a screening at the theater. Directed by Quentin Tarantino. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: In this incredible crime drama based on true events, federal agent Robert Mazur goes undercover as a money-laundering businessman in an attempt to bring down Pablo Escobar's Medellín Cartel in the 1980s. (Repeat).

programme.title: Faster
programme.desc: In this heart-pounding action thriller, Driver (Dwayne Johnson) seeks revenge on the man responsible for his brother's death, but a devoted cop gets wind of his plan and tries to stop him from carrying it out. Meanwhile, a hit man attempts to end Driver's life before he completes his task. (Repeat).

programme.title: Enough
programme.desc: In this gripping drama, a battered wife goes on the lam with her young daughter, but decides to fight back when her abusive husband tracks them down. (Repeat).

programme.title: Heist 88
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind recruits a group of young bank employees to steal 80 million dollars in one of the largest bank heist in US history. (Repeat).

programme.title: Just Mercy
programme.desc: With huge opportunities laid down even before he graduated from Harvard Law School, Bryan Stevenson's career is shaping up to be an impressive one. He, however, decides to forgo all of those offers in order to go to Alabama and represent those who cannot afford a lawyer and those who are wrongly accused. There, he takes on the case of an African-American man wrongly imprisoned for the murder of a white woman. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pig
programme.desc: A truffle hunter who lives alone in the Oregon wilderness must visit Portland to find the mysterious person who stole his beloved foraging pig. (Repeat).

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: While grappling with her seemingly insurmountable grief, a young woman named Vanessa embarks on a retreat in search of some solace. However, she soon discovers that the lines between different realities have begun to blur, and she finds herself caught in the crossfire. (Repeat).

programme.title: Looper
programme.desc: Time travel and the mob send a hired gun on the run when he must kill an older version of himself in order to prevent an underworld bloodbath in this smart and inventive sci-fi actioner. (Repeat).

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: In this thrilling and provocative revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff. (Repeat).

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: Jack Black earned a Golden Globe nomination for his inspired performance in Richard Linklater's whimsical comedy. He plays a manic slacker-turned-substitute teacher who transforms his sheltered private-school pupils into a full-fledged rock band. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dear Santa
programme.desc: Liam writes to Santa asking him to prove that he's real. But Liam is dyslexic and accidentally sends his letter to Satan instead, who shows up at Liam's house, excited to have his first fanboy letter and wanting a little of Liam's soul. (New).

programme.title: Looper
programme.desc: Time travel and the mob send a hired gun on the run when he must kill an older version of himself in order to prevent an underworld bloodbath in this smart and inventive sci-fi actioner. (Repeat).

programme.title: Heist 88
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind recruits a group of young bank employees to steal 80 million dollars in one of the largest bank heist in US history. (Repeat).

programme.title: Just Mercy
programme.desc: With huge opportunities laid down even before he graduated from Harvard Law School, Bryan Stevenson's career is shaping up to be an impressive one. He, however, decides to forgo all of those offers in order to go to Alabama and represent those who cannot afford a lawyer and those who are wrongly accused. There, he takes on the case of an African-American man wrongly imprisoned for the murder of a white woman. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool
programme.desc: Thomas has the ideal life with a good job, a house, and a loving family. All this is threatened when his mistress is found dead in his swimming pool on the same day his family throws a surprise birthday party in the same backyard. As he scrambles to maintain his life as it has been, Thomas soon discovers that he might not be the only one hiding something. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pig
programme.desc: A truffle hunter who lives alone in the Oregon wilderness must visit Portland to find the mysterious person who stole his beloved foraging pig. (Repeat).

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: Tale about a snob and a slob on the road who keep running into trouble—and each other—on their respective way home for Thanksgiving after they get stuck in Wichita when they were en route to Chicago. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: An Eastern European man is forced to live at JFK Airport after his visa is canceled due to a coup in his own country in this charming drama. In time, the terminal becomes a virtual country within itself, complete with culture, ambition, status, diversity and the need for love. (Repeat).

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: Costars and co-writers Matt Damon and Ben Affleck won an Oscar for their tale of a charismatic genius (Damon) who lands in jail after a playground brawl. His hope for the future lies with a sympathetic therapist (Best Supporting Actor Robin Williams), who understands the young man's rebellious nature. Minnie Driver, Stellan Skarsgard, Casey Affleck. (Repeat).

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg won the Best Director Oscar for this stunning war drama following a squad of U.S. Army soldiers on a mission to rescue a GI trapped behind enemy lines in France on D-Day after all three of the soldier's brothers are killed in action. As the search commences, the close-knit squad sets out through areas still thick with Nazis. (Repeat).

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Six Oscars, including Best Picture and Actor (Tom Hanks), went to this extraordinary tale of a simple man who unwittingly becomes involved in some of the key moments of the 20th century. Meanwhile, as the remarkable parade of his life goes by, Forrest never forgets Jenny, the girl he loved as a boy, who makes her own journey through the turbulence of the 1960s and '70s that is far more troubled than the path Forrest happens upon. (Repeat).

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In this inventive sci-fi film set in a society where the population is segregated by personality, a teenager classified as "divergent" uncovers a plot to kill everyone in her category and races to find out why they are considered so uniquely dangerous. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
programme.desc: In this thrilling and nail-biting entry in the Divergent series, Tris and Four seek refuge outside of the city with the Amity faction. They convene with other Divergents and exiled survivors, and plot to fight back against the warmongering Dauntless and despot Jeanine Matthews. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey out of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization in this thrilling entry in the YA adventure series. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind. (Repeat).

programme.title: The November Man
programme.desc: The thrills never stop when an ex-CIA agent is targeted by his former protégé while racing to protect a witness. As the bullets start to fly, he must live long enough to protect his charge, and root out the mole who has put his entire mission in jeopardy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Varsity Blues
programme.desc: In this rousing coming-of-age tale, a second-string high-school quarterback (James Van Der Beek) replaces the injured starter. At first, the quarterback revels in his new role, but then, his relaxed attitude causes problems with his gung-ho coach (Jon Voight). Paul Walker, Rob Lester, Scott Caan, Richard Lineback, Ali Larter, Tiffany C. Love. (Repeat).

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: In a dystopian future of oxygen scarcity, Maya and her daughter Zora cling to survival underground. Their fragile existence is upended by the arrival of a couple claiming ties to Maya's presumed dead husband. As secrets unravel, mother and daughter must confront the true nature of their visitors to survive. (Repeat).

programme.title: Blinded by the Light
programme.desc: A second-generation British-Pakistani teenager comes of age in a small town during the Thatcher era, rebelling against parental and cultural expectations and the confines of provincial life with the help of Bruce Springsteen's empowering music and relatable lyricism. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: A psychic facilitates a dead banker's return to protect his girlfriend from the man who murdered him. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: A beautiful woman stops aging after a car accident, and remains 29 for several decades in this intriguing fantasy. She refuses to get close to anyone in order to keep her condition a secret, but reconsiders her solitary lifestyle after falling in love with a philanthropist. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ezra
programme.desc: Max Bernal, a struggling stand-up comedian, faces the daunting challenge of co-parenting his autistic son, Ezra, with his ex-wife, Jenna. Living with his father, Max grapples with tough choices regarding Ezra's future. Together, father and son embark on a transformative cross-country journey that bonds them in unexpected ways. What follows is a heartfelt tale of family resilience, humor, and compassion. (Repeat).

programme.title: Looper
programme.desc: Time travel and the mob send a hired gun on the run when he must kill an older version of himself in order to prevent an underworld bloodbath in this smart and inventive sci-fi actioner. (Repeat).

programme.title: Seabiscuit
programme.desc: A triumphant Cinderella story about the crowd-pleasing Depression-era thoroughbred Seabiscuit. Together, Seabiscuit's downtrodden jockey, wizened trainer and entrepreneurial owner lead the horse to several victories that helped to inspire a Americans during the downtrodden 1930s. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Thrilling action and Russell Crowe's Oscar-winning performance drive 2000's Best Picture, the story of a Roman general who is enslaved and forced to become a gladiator after he clashes with the emperor's bloodthirsty son. (Repeat).

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: In a dystopian future of oxygen scarcity, Maya and her daughter Zora cling to survival underground. Their fragile existence is upended by the arrival of a couple claiming ties to Maya's presumed dead husband. As secrets unravel, mother and daughter must confront the true nature of their visitors to survive. (Repeat).

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: While grappling with her seemingly insurmountable grief, a young woman named Vanessa embarks on a retreat in search of some solace. However, she soon discovers that the lines between different realities have begun to blur, and she finds herself caught in the crossfire. (Repeat).

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: The lives of four Harlem friends, one of whom is an aspiring deejay, fall apart following their involvement in a holdup gone fatally wrong. (Repeat).

programme.title: B. A.
programme.desc: A gang initiation goes wrong when a group of four recruits break into a house of horror. Win and you live - lose and you die. Sheaun McKinney, Tunde Laleye. (Repeat).

programme.title: Lavell Crawford: Thee Lavell Crawford
programme.desc: Live from New Orleans, Lavell Crawford is back with a new comedy special, riffing on everything from white neighborhoods to getting blessed with impossibly good deals on chicken and so much more. (Repeat).

programme.title: All Styles
programme.desc: A young hip-hop artist has a falling out with his dance crew over his decision to go to college before a big competition. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hands Up
programme.desc: After his cousin is shot and killed by a white police officer in Chicago and Black Lives Matter protests spread across the city, a black inner city teen desperately fights for a way out of the most notorious murder capital of America. (Repeat).

programme.title: S.O.G.: The Book of Ward
programme.desc: Andre Ward's journey from the streets of Oakland to the International Boxing Hall of Fame. Facing an all-too familiar series of obstacles including substance abuse, the loss of a parent, drug dealing and teen pregnancy, how Ward faced that adversity is what separates him from the rest. Fight after fight he defied the odds and silenced his critics. And then, guided by faith and devotion, he walked away, choosing his role as a father and a husband over his boxing career. (Repeat).

programme.title: Nana's Boys
programme.desc: Nana's Boys focuses on the intimate life of a couple who are confronted with the fact that their relationship is not as solid as they thought. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: A warden/football fan tags a new convict, an ex-pro QB, to choose a team from among his inmates to play against the well-trained prison guards. (Repeat).

programme.title: When We Were Kings
programme.desc: Leon Gast's Oscar-winning portrait of Muhammad Ali, filmed in 1974 during the buildup to his highly publicized fight with George Foreman in Zaire. Narrated by Spike Lee, Norman Mailer and George Plimpton. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Inspirational documentary that follows two high-school basketball players over four years as they set their sights on college scholarships and a chance to play in the NBA. (Repeat).

programme.title: MVP
programme.desc: On the streets of Hollywood, a recently retired NFL player is saved from scandal by a homeless veteran. With their "glory days" behind them, the two men bond in search of purpose and identity. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: A warden/football fan tags a new convict, an ex-pro QB, to choose a team from among his inmates to play against the well-trained prison guards. (Repeat).

programme.title: A Thin Line Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: An ambitious nightclub promoter discovers that the woman he tried so hard to get is even harder to get rid of when their casual romance turns deadly serious. Directed by Martin Lawrence. Kris Kristofferson, Barbara Hershey, Leelee Sobieski, Jane Birkin, Dominique Blanc, Jesse Bradford, James Ivory. (Repeat).

programme.title: Top Five
programme.desc: A comedian-turned-movie star spends time with a journalist who's writing a profile on him, just as his latest film is getting terrible reviews. Along the way, he is forced to reflect on his past, his career mistakes and his upcoming marriage to a reality-TV starlet. (Repeat).

programme.title: Paid in Full
programme.desc: Charles Stone III, who directed the "Whassup!" Budweiser commercials, is the driving force behind this powerful fact-based drama set in 1986. Wood Harris is superb as a straight-arrow Harlem delivery man who gets involved selling drugs and becomes the premier distributor of cocaine in his neighborhood. Mekhi Phifer, Kevin Carroll, Cam'ron. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Birth of a Black Movie Hero: Sweet Sweetback
programme.desc: The genesis of sweet sweetback's Baadassss Song. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Harder They Come
programme.desc: The story of a 1950s Kingston Robin Hood (Jimmy Cliff), driven by a striking reggae score. Jose: Carl Bradshaw. Preacher: Basil Keane. Elsa: Janet Bartley. Detective: Winston Stona. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Inspirational documentary that follows two high-school basketball players over four years as they set their sights on college scholarships and a chance to play in the NBA. (Repeat).

programme.title: Kobe Bryant's Muse
programme.desc: An in-depth look at the on and off-court life of the 16-time NBA All-Star, who has helped the Lakers win five championships. Included: the mentors, allies and rivalries that have shaped his career, and his thoughts on what lies ahead. (Repeat).

programme.title: An Acceptable Loss
programme.desc: A former U.S. security adviser's dark past comes back to haunt her. (Repeat).

programme.title: Warrior Strong
programme.desc: To save the career he endangered with his hotheaded attitude, professional basketball player Bilal Irving takes on a new job - coaching the failing basketball team in his hometown of Dumont, Ontario. He's got just one obstacle: his former coach, whose ideas about coaching vastly differ from that of Bilal's. The two will have to put aside their differences and their attitudes if this small-town team is to have any chance at winning. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations
programme.desc: Beyonce Knowles and Cuba Gooding Jr. star in this lively musical comedy about an ad executive who must lead a Georgia choir to victory in a gospel competition if he is to collect his inheritance. Along the way, he finds himself getting in tune romantically with one of the singers. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Wood
programme.desc: Three black friends gather for a wedding, and recall their teen years growing up in 1980s Inglewood, Cal., after the groom gets cold feet and starts thinking about his high-school sweetheart. A touching and nostalgic coming-of-age tale. (Repeat).

programme.title: Passion Play: Russell Westbrook
programme.desc: Chronicling the life and profession of Russell Westbrook, one of the best point gatekeepers ever. Regardless of his prosperity, he enters the 2021-22 season. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spotlights: A Showtime Short Film Series
programme.desc: A teenage girl learns a secret while visiting her family in Jamaica. (Repeat).

programme.title: Organ Trail
programme.desc: In the 1870s, a young woman named Abigale Archer is determined to survive a ruthless winter in Montana. Fighting the cold by herself, Abigale has little to lose. When a gang of bandits steals her family's horse, Abigale becomes committed to saving the only thing she cares about. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations
programme.desc: Beyonce Knowles and Cuba Gooding Jr. star in this lively musical comedy about an ad executive who must lead a Georgia choir to victory in a gospel competition if he is to collect his inheritance. Along the way, he finds himself getting in tune romantically with one of the singers. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Wood
programme.desc: Three black friends gather for a wedding, and recall their teen years growing up in 1980s Inglewood, Cal., after the groom gets cold feet and starts thinking about his high-school sweetheart. A touching and nostalgic coming-of-age tale. (Repeat).

programme.title: 48 Hrs.
programme.desc: When cop killers escape prison, a detective enlists the help of a convict to help track them down...in 48 hours. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Dynamic Samuel L. Jackson stars as New York City cop John Shaft, who quits the force and decides to dispense his own brand of vigilante justice against a racist killer (Christian Bale) and a Dominican drug lord (Jeffrey Wright). Richard Roundtree, who played the original John Shaft in three '70s crime dramas, has a cameo as Jackson's uncle and namesake. Busta Rhymes, Vanessa Williams, Dan Hedaya. (Repeat).

programme.title: After Innocence
programme.desc: Travesty-of-justice chronicle of several wrongly imprisoned men who are set free after DNA evidence exonerates them. (Repeat).

programme.title: Passion Play: Russell Westbrook
programme.desc: Chronicling the life and profession of Russell Westbrook, one of the best point gatekeepers ever. Regardless of his prosperity, he enters the 2021-22 season. (Repeat).

programme.title: Just Mercy
programme.desc: With huge opportunities laid down even before he graduated from Harvard Law School, Bryan Stevenson's career is shaping up to be an impressive one. He, however, decides to forgo all of those offers in order to go to Alabama and represent those who cannot afford a lawyer and those who are wrongly accused. There, he takes on the case of an African-American man wrongly imprisoned for the murder of a white woman. (Repeat).

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A crack Detroit detective pursues a pal's killer through the plastic jungle of Southern California, where he tweaks authority, tumbles with the bad guys and bends the rules. (Repeat).

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy returns as smooth Detroit street cop Axel Foley, who's back on the West Coast to track down a gunman and investigate a series of violent robberies. John Ashton, Ronny Cox and Judge Reinhold reprise their roles. (Repeat).

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: A wiseacre cop from Detroit finds himself in L.A. trailing killers and counterfeiters at an amusement park. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Ladies Man
programme.desc: Tim Meadows gets down and dirty as his Saturday Night Live character Leon Phelps in this raunchy comedy. When the randy late-night disc jockey loses his job, his producer (Karyn Parsons) helps him find work. Leon also must contend with jealous husbands seeking revenge for his romantic attentions to their wives. Billy Dee Williams, Will Ferrell, John Witherspoon. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Long Kiss Goodnight
programme.desc: Geena Davis stars in this action-packed thriller about a schoolteacher with amnesia. When a car accident triggers her memory, she teams with a PI to uncover her past, and finds she was a cold-blooded assassin for the CIA. Samuel L. Jackson, Patrick Malahide, Craig Bierko, David Morse. (Repeat).

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A crack Detroit detective pursues a pal's killer through the plastic jungle of Southern California, where he tweaks authority, tumbles with the bad guys and bends the rules. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: In this nail-biting chiller, Simon and Robyn, a young married couple, find their lives thrown into a tailspin after Simon has a chance encounter with a former acquaintance, the off-kilter Gordo. Gordo then starts giving the couple unwanted and increasingly menacing gifts. (Repeat).

programme.title: Mr. Brooks
programme.desc: A police detective who lost the trail of a serial killer years earlier begins to suspect a successful and prominent businessman is the perpetrator. (Repeat).

programme.title: Chloe
programme.desc: In this erotically charged drama, Catherine (Julianne Moore) suspects her husband David (Liam Neeson) may be cheating on her, so she hires a prostitute named Chloe (Amanda Seyfried) to flirt with him and report back to her about how he responds. However, Catherine eventually finds herself drawn to Chloe and the stories she shares of her erotic encounters with David. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tale of Tales
programme.desc: In this sublime adaptation of three 17th-century Italian fairy tales about troubled royals, a queen conceives a child by eating a monster's heart, a king grows obsessed with a pet flea and a ruler is bewitched by a woman with a beautiful singing voice. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: In this nail-biting chiller, Simon and Robyn, a young married couple, find their lives thrown into a tailspin after Simon has a chance encounter with a former acquaintance, the off-kilter Gordo. Gordo then starts giving the couple unwanted and increasingly menacing gifts. (Repeat).

programme.title: Singularity
programme.desc: In 2020, a supercomputer determines that human beings pose the greatest threat to Earth, and begins an eradication process. Decades later, a teen struggles to survive in a world dominated by machines in this haunting sci-fi thriller. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Voyage of the Demeter
programme.desc: In the late nineteenth century, the Russian schooner Demeter embarks on an unusual quest, carrying twenty-four unmarked crates from Carpathia to London. Their voyage seems doomed from the start, given their suspicious orders, as a malevolent presence preys upon each member of the crew. When the ship arrives, at last, in Whitby Harbour, the crew is nowhere to be found. The story is based on a chapter from Bram Stoker's Dracula. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Dead Zone
programme.desc: A teacher awakens from a five-year coma with supernatural powers. He struggles with his new gift and attempts to use it for good while coming to terms with the life he has missed out on. Based on the novel by Stephen King. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Men living in a small desert community come upon some inexplicable phenomena, including at least one very grisly body. It turns out that there are gigantic wormlike carnivores living under the desert that come up to feed on humans. (Repeat).

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
programme.desc: Best Actor Oscar nominee Johnny Depp perfectly embodies the title role in Tim Burton's bloody well-done adaptation of the Stephen Sondheim musical about the vengeful owner of a tonsorial parlor that offers customers more than just a shave and a haircut. Helena Bonham Carter costars as Mrs. Lovett, who makes a killing with her new pie recipe containing a special meaty ingredient. (Repeat).

programme.title: Talk To Me
programme.desc: A group of friends plays a dangerous game against the spirit world. After stumbling on an embalmed hand, the group figures out how to use it to conjure spirits. Consumed by this thrilling new power to communicate with the dead, they unlock the spirit world and must face the deadly consequences. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Faculty
programme.desc: High schoolers face an onslaught of aliens who have taken over the bodies of their teachers. (Repeat).

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: When a murderer is killed in a police shoot-out, he invokes a voodoo spell that allows him to transfer his spirit into a doll. (Repeat).

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: Katie Cassidy and Michelle Trachtenberg star in this terrifying update of a 1974 cult slasher flick about a psycho terrorizing a sorority house during the holiday season. Kristen Cloke, Crystal Lowe, Lacey Chabert. Directed by Glen Morgan. (Repeat).

programme.title: Scream VI
programme.desc: Bored of the quaint town of Woodsboro, the notorious serial killer Ghostface leaves his small-town stomping grounds behind, pursuing more ambitious conquests in New York City. Determined to overthrow his reign of terror once and for all, a cohort of familiar faces returns to seek justice for the bloodshed. The sixth installment in the horror franchise. (Repeat).

programme.title: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: At the Appalachian Trail areas, Jen goes on a hike with friends. They abandon the prescribed trail and wander off into areas that, unknown to them, are occupied by The Foundation. As they are about to find out, this reclusive hidden community zealously guards their privacy and territory—to the death. (Repeat).

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: In this chilling remake of the 2002 horror film of the same name, a group of friends head to a remote cabin in the woods for a vacation. However, their fun is soon interrupted by a flesh-eating virus that claims them one-by-one. (Repeat).

programme.title: God's Petting You
programme.desc: God's Petting You is a dark and twisted comedy that explores the depths and depravity of the Brighton underworld. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Men living in a small desert community come upon some inexplicable phenomena, including at least one very grisly body. It turns out that there are gigantic wormlike carnivores living under the desert that come up to feed on humans. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hard Eight
programme.desc: Middle-aged pro gambler Sydney takes young John under his wing, teaching him the tricks of the trade. In the process, John falls for a waitress that Sydney also looks after---and falls under the influence of a small-time hoodlum. (Repeat).

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: A lone stranger takes on two factions of rival bootleggers in a desolate 1930s frontier town, pitting both sides against each other and profiting from the chaotic results. Bruce Willis, Bruce Dern, Christopher Walken, Michael Imperioli, David Patrick Kelly, Alexandra Powers, Karina Lombard, Leslie Mann, Ned Eisenberg, Ken Jenkins, R.D. Call, Ted Markland, Patrick Kilpatrick, Luis Contreras. (Repeat).

programme.title: A Simple Plan
programme.desc: Bill Paxton and Billy Bob Thornton give superb performances in this gripping thriller. The plot revolves around three men who discover a crashed plane containing $4.4 million, and chronicles how their lives unravel after they scheme to steal the loot. Bridget Fonda, Gary Cole, Brent Briscoe, Jack Walsh, Sam Raimi. (Repeat).

programme.title: Heat
programme.desc: A successful career criminal considers getting out of the business after one last score with his crew, while an obsessive cop desperately tries to put him behind bars. The memorable "cafe scene" marks the first time Al Pacino and Robert De Niro have appeared on-screen together. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Thrilling action and Russell Crowe's Oscar-winning performance drive 2000's Best Picture, the story of a Roman general who is enslaved and forced to become a gladiator after he clashes with the emperor's bloodthirsty son. (Repeat).

programme.title: Goodfellas
programme.desc: Gangster saga explores the life of organized crime as it chronicles the true-life rise and fall of New York mobster and FBI informant Henry Hill and the more prominent "goodfellas" in his world. Henry comes up through the ranks, but quickly learns that his half-Irish, half-Sicilian ethnicity prevents him from ever becoming a "made guy." Soon he finds himself the target of both the feds and his Mafia family, who feel that he has become a threat to their security with his reckless dealings. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
programme.desc: An ambitious young stockbroker begins a new firm and finds meteoric success by selling penny stocks to the super wealthy. He amasses a fortune through less than legal means, and soon his law-breaking and massive drug habit collapse his empire. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pig
programme.desc: A truffle hunter who lives alone in the Oregon wilderness must visit Portland to find the mysterious person who stole his beloved foraging pig. (Repeat).

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: Writer-director Kevin Smith deftly blends sweet romance with crude, lewd inspired lunacy in this outrageously funny comedy. Seth Rogen and Elizabeth Banks play cash-strapped platonic roommates who try to make it in the adult-movie business in an attempt to get out of debt. A superb ensemble cast of costars features Craig Robinson, Jason Mewes, Justin Long, Ricky Mabe and Jeff Anderson. Former adult-film performers Traci Lords and Katie Morgan also have roles. (Repeat).

programme.title: First Shift
programme.desc: A rookie cop faces unexpected challenges and dangers during her first night on the job. She must navigate a series of intense situations to prove herself. (Repeat).

programme.title: 6 Days
programme.desc: In 1980, six gunmen storm the Iranian Embassy in London and take 26 hostages. While a police negotiator tries to prevent further violence, SAS teams plan for a raid in this tense, gripping drama based on real events. (Repeat).

programme.title: NYC Point Gods
programme.desc: Against the backdrop of New York City's epidemic of drugs and crime in the 1980s and 1990s, a unique style of basketball emerged on the city's courts, defined by toughness, talent and swagger. (Repeat).

programme.title: Transporter 3
programme.desc: Jason Statham is back for more pedal-to-the-metal action, as mob courier Frank Martin is hired to transport the kidnapped daughter of a Ukrainian government official from Marseilles, France, to Odessa, Ukraine, while being chased by assassins. Natalya Rudakova, Francois Berleand, Robert Knepper, Jeroen Krabbe. Directed by Olivier Megaton. (Repeat).

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: An ex-CIA operative leads a quest into the dangerous African Congo in search of her presumed dead fiancé. Along for the ride is a primatologist, his assistant, a talking gorilla, a Romanian backer with his own agenda and a jungle-savvy mercenary. Based on the novel by Michael Crichton. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Dead Don't Hurt
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice. (Repeat).

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: Gripping and ripping remake of the 1957 Western about a small-time rancher (Christian Bale) escorting a murderous outlaw (Russell Crowe) to a rendezvous with the law and a train that will take him to prison. Meanwhile, the desperado's henchmen try to head them off and free their leader, because without him they're "like a pack of dogs without a master." Directed by James Mangold, from a 1953 short story by Elmore Leonard. Ben Foster, Gretchen Mol, Dallas Roberts, Alan Tudyk, Peter Fonda. (Repeat).

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: In this thrilling and provocative revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff. (Repeat).

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: In the Coen brothers' stirring remake of the John Wayne classic, an alcoholic U.S. Marshal and an independent-minded 14-year-old girl track down her father's killer with the help of a Texas Ranger. As the three brave dangerous Indian territory, they discover their prey has fallen in with a more-experienced criminal. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: An English professor borrows money from a vicious gangster in an attempt to pay off his gambling debts in this poignant psychological drama. At the same time, he must contend with his disappointed mother and his affair with a precocious student. (Repeat).

programme.title: Casino Royale
programme.desc: Daniel Craig kills in his first outing as British secret agent James Bond. In this gripping and ripping adaptation of Ian Fleming's first 007 adventure, Bond tries to turn the tables on a terrorist banker, whom he's engaged in a high-stakes poker game. (Repeat).

programme.title: Get Rich Or Die Tryin'
programme.desc: Saga of a street kid turned drug dealer turned rap artist, loosely based on the life of hip-hop star Calvin "50 Cent" Jackson, who basically plays himself. (Repeat).

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: In this chilling remake of the 2002 horror film of the same name, a group of friends head to a remote cabin in the woods for a vacation. However, their fun is soon interrupted by a flesh-eating virus that claims them one-by-one. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Inspection
programme.desc: Ellis French is a young, gay Black man, rejected by his mother and with few options for his future, decides to join the Marines, doing whatever it takes to succeed in a system that would cast him aside. But even as he battles deep-seated prejudice and the grueling routines of basic training, he finds unexpected camaraderie, strength, and support in this new community, giving him a hard-earned sense of belonging that will shape his identity and forever change his life. (Repeat).

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: After his home in Peru is destroyed, a talking bear named Paddington travels to London, where he is taken in by a kindly family. However, a museum taxidermist is determined to make a trophy out of him in this endearing adventure for all ages. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ernest Saves Christmas
programme.desc: Ernest scrambles to find a successor for Santa Claus in this Yuletide comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Free Birds
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy for the entire family, two turkeys travel back in time to the first Thanksgiving in order to change the traditional menu and save their kind from being served with a side of cranberry sauce for the holiday. (Repeat).

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: In this suspenseful, well-plotted and beautifully acted legal thriller, an attorney who's brought a wrongful-death lawsuit against a gun manufacturer, a jury consultant working for the company, and a member of the jury cross paths. The film is based on a John Grisham bestseller. (Repeat).

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: Costars and co-writers Matt Damon and Ben Affleck won an Oscar for their tale of a charismatic genius (Damon) who lands in jail after a playground brawl. His hope for the future lies with a sympathetic therapist (Best Supporting Actor Robin Williams), who understands the young man's rebellious nature. Minnie Driver, Stellan Skarsgard, Casey Affleck. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Lincoln Lawyer
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding thriller, ethically challenged lawyer Mickey (Matthew McConaughey) lands a high-profile case defending a rich playboy accused of murder, but he soon discovers he'll need to keep his wits about him to get through the case alive. Directed by Brad Furman. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Dead Don't Hurt
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A breathtakingly paced remake of the 1969 caper film starring Michael Caine, with a gang of thieves out to retake some gold that was stolen from them after they pilfered it from a palazzo in Venice. The film features exciting chase scenes involving Mini Coopers racing through metropolitan Los Angeles. (Repeat).

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In this inventive sci-fi film set in a society where the population is segregated by personality, a teenager classified as "divergent" uncovers a plot to kill everyone in her category and races to find out why they are considered so uniquely dangerous. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
programme.desc: In this thrilling and nail-biting entry in the Divergent series, Tris and Four seek refuge outside of the city with the Amity faction. They convene with other Divergents and exiled survivors, and plot to fight back against the warmongering Dauntless and despot Jeanine Matthews. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey out of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization in this thrilling entry in the YA adventure series. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Dead Don't Hurt
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice. (Repeat).

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: Costars and co-writers Matt Damon and Ben Affleck won an Oscar for their tale of a charismatic genius (Damon) who lands in jail after a playground brawl. His hope for the future lies with a sympathetic therapist (Best Supporting Actor Robin Williams), who understands the young man's rebellious nature. Minnie Driver, Stellan Skarsgard, Casey Affleck. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hugo
programme.desc: In this wondrous fantasy film directed by Martin Scorsese, a young orphan named Hugo Cabret (Asa Butterfield) lives in a train station in 1930s Paris and tries to repair a mechanical man built by his father. Eventually, Hugo befriends a filmmaker and his goddaughter, who help him understand the mystery of his dad's invention. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: In this sweeping tale of Internet success, nerdy, awkward Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the Web site Facebook and becomes a billionaire, but ends up embroiled in legal disputes as the friends who helped him during his rise to the top are now eager to see him fall. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: A psychic facilitates a dead banker's return to protect his girlfriend from the man who murdered him. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: A headstrong military man and a scientist go on a frantic search for stolen nuclear warheads before they fall into the wrong hands in this explosive action thriller. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool
programme.desc: Thomas has the ideal life with a good job, a house, and a loving family. All this is threatened when his mistress is found dead in his swimming pool on the same day his family throws a surprise birthday party in the same backyard. As he scrambles to maintain his life as it has been, Thomas soon discovers that he might not be the only one hiding something. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg gives a charged performance in this high-powered actioner about an ex-Marine sniper who is recruited for a clandestine special op and instead finds himself on the run after being targeted as the perpetrator of a presidential assassination attempt. Danny Glover, Kate Mara, Michael Pena, Tate Donovan, Ned Beatty, Rhona Mitra, Elias Koteas. Directed by Antoine Fuqua and written by Jonathan Lemkin, who adapted Stephen Hunter's book "Point of Impact." (Repeat).

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: This thrilling war epic is about an American military officer who leads a special squad of soldiers who perform quick strikes against the Nazis in enemy territory. They team up with a French theater owner whose parents were killed by the Third Reich for a plot to execute Hitler and his right-hand men at a screening at the theater. Directed by Quentin Tarantino. (Repeat).

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma

Meanwhile, the desperado's henchmen try to head them off and free their leader, because without him they're "like a pack of dogs without a master." Directed by James Mangold, from a 1953 short story by Elmore Leonard. Ben Foster, Gretchen Mol, Dallas Roberts, Alan Tudyk, Peter Fonda. (Repeat).

programme.title: Magnolia

Peter Weir directed and received an Oscar nomination of his own. Noah Emmerich, Natascha McElhone, Holland Taylor. (Repeat).

Directed by Kathryn Bigelow. Guy Pearce, Ralph Fiennes. (Repeat).

He's got just one obstacle: his former coach, whose ideas about coaching vastly differ from that of Bilal's. The two will have to put aside their differences and their attitudes if this small-town team is to have any chance at winning. (Repeat).

programme.desc: Up-and-coming photographer Aimée strives to make it in the photography world. She finds herself squandering her talents as her demanding boss's assistant. programme.desc: The Marsh family is getting together for their first Christmas Eve after three years of pandemic lockdown. (Repeat).

She works for her fiancé's father, so Elizabeth wants to clinch the sale at his behest. Randy objects to being bought outright but proposes an alternative. If Elizabeth could win their town's annual Christmas-related competitions, he'd sell his property. The problem is, she needs to beat the long-running champion: her perfectionist sister. (Repeat).

programme.title: My Fair Lady

The film won a total of eight Oscars. (Repeat).

programme.desc: Exciting car chases and frenetic martial-arts action fortify this action-packed crime thriller from writer-producer Luc Besson. Jason Statham stars as Frank Martin, a deliveryman of illicit packages who gets mixed up in an Asian slave ring. Shu Qi, Matt Schulze, Ric Young, Francois Berleand.

programme.title: The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare
programme.desc: This spy action-comedy film portrays a fictionalized version of a British intelligence organization called Special Operations Executive. During World War II, the team's main goal is to sabotage efforts by Nazi Germany by conducting and facilitating espionage missions. The group is touted as the forerunner of contemporary military black operations. The force is composed of select military officials and rogues of improper behavior who utilize unconventional tactics.

programme.title: Plane
programme.desc: On a commercial flight, a violent storm forces a pilot to make an emergency landing. Yet the situation soon escalates when the pilot realizes he landed in the heart of a war zone. He must then rely on a convict from his flight to rescue the others being held hostage by militants.

programme.title: How the Gringo Stole Christmas
programme.desc: When Bennie's daughter comes home for Christmas, she brings a surprise gringo boyfriend with her. Bennie is a traditional Mexican who is taken aback by his daughter's choice of partner and is having a hard time accepting him. This Christmas, he must learn to grow or risk losing the trust of his family.

programme.title: Welcome Home Roscoe Jenkins
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence stars in this uproarious farce about a successful self-help guru and TV talk-show host who finds himself embroiled in a series of comic disasters when he goes home to Georgia for his parents' 50th wedding anniversary. James Earl Jones, Margaret Avery, Joy Bryant, Cedric the Entertainer. Written and directed by Malcolm D. Lee.

programme.title: Friendsgiving
programme.desc: After years of awkward family gatherings, thirty-somethings Abby and Molly decide to invite their closest friends over for a Thanksgiving celebration. However, they soon learn the challenges of hosting a feast for all of their friends, much to their dismay.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Jamie, Claire, and Ian return to Lallybroch. Ian reconnects with his family in a time of need, while Claire deals with the fallout from a long-held secret. Roger and Buck search for Jemmy in the past. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In this exciting adaptation of the popular novel, 16-year-old Katniss Everdeen must compete in a cruel televised tournament in which 24 teenagers from a postapocalyptic society fight to the death for the entertainment of the masses.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: In this stunning sci-fi sequel, Katniss and Peeta tour Panem and sense growing unrest as they prepare to participate in the 75th Hunger Games. Meanwhile, President Snow plots their downfall during preparations for the Quarter Quell, which only occurs every 25 years in celebration of the Capitol's victory over the districts.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay, Part 1
programme.desc: Katniss ends up in District 13 following the Quarter Quell, and sets out to save Peeta while forging a fragile alliance with President Coin in this exciting sequel. Meanwhile, Katniss' courage becomes a source of inspiration to the downtrodden masses.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: A series following people with severe weight issues begins with the seven-year weight-loss journey of a 650-lb. woman. (Repeat).
